name: Positional Turn Based Combat Test
description:
Note: This is a rough concept system. So expect it to be a little finicky.
This is a demo of a turn-based combat system. Made in 2 weeks for Game Design Studio 1 at UCSC Fall 2021

Made by:

Jared Nolen

Adam Carter

Ryan Marcus

Gurkirat Saini

Juan Alvarado

Stryker Buffington

Code Repo: https://github.com/Jnolen15/170TurnsInTeams
